title: How i feel after playing against Ahri.

replies.body:
How i feel after playing against a decent yasuo 
https://camo.derpicdn.net/8e3d26c1137e26e017e50197507edb635d438c88?url=http%3A%2F%2Fs15.postimg.org%2F640glrebv%2F1336845717474.jpg
At least theres such a thing as a not-decent Yasuo, with ahri she has 8 missiles and 6 of them are self targeting... D:

i know, when i go mid and see ahri in the load screen, i cringe

misses everything for 10 minutes, lands 1 charm..... dead.
exactly, good thing 95% of them arent

what I think when i see an ahri 

Free win... just gotta wait for the camp
Yea.. Gotta love that 53.1% free win rate aye...
just because others struggle with her doesnt mean i do. + most ahri are bad, their enemies are usually just worse or they got a camp
well the 53.1% win rate means that more people struggle against her than people who don't, thats just a fact.

thats not "just a fact" ahri can go 2/23/11 and still win, teams can carry the scrubby "Aza's", because 60%+ of them suck, all they need to do is spam enough e to hit someone in a teamfight to win it.

stupid name change, who has ever said Aza, Big Al, Corka, Cozzie, Merv, Eks or any of that crap.

the only things there that have ever been said are Gazza, Brad, Donger and {{champion:150}}ly for surf puns.

Idc if it is an april fools joke, its stupid and not funny in any way.
Only if it's a good Ahri lel
